text:
@SenatorDurbin Thousands of immigrant IT Folks also stuck in the #GCBACKLOG ,they are helping to keep things connected for front line forces to help in this pandemic #COVID19.  
Congress must direct unused visas to these #ImmigrantHeros - we need all hands on deck to beat this virus. https://t.co/JfmS20SHO2

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
